thread.title: Shay Mitchell’s gorgeous co-ord outfit has us dreaming of vacay — here’s how to copy it for your own
thread.title_full: Shay Mitchell’s gorgeous co-ord outfit has us dreaming of vacay — here’s how to copy it for your own

author: Claire Beaudreault
title: Shay Mitchell’s gorgeous co-ord outfit has us dreaming of vacay — here’s how to copy it for your own

organizations.name: asos bright bamboo palm print wrap beach crop top co-ord
roxy floral crop & split front maxi co-ord set

text:
Shay Mitchell’s gorgeous co-ord outfit has us dreaming of vacay — here’s how to copy it for your own Shay Mitchell showed off a stunning co-ord ensemble in a vacation snapshot, and now we can’t stop daydreaming about our next vacation.
The Pretty Little Liars star’s sexy two-piece look is goals . She rocked a long skirt with a slit and plunging wrap top that strategically showed skin in a totally wearable way , and we need it now!
Shay knows how to rock a wrap dress that flatters her figure. This ain’t your mom’s DVF wrap! She wore a luxe, low-cut velvet number to an awards ceremony this past fall, and isn’t afraid to step out on the red carpet in a gold pantsuit . Shay even makes a boxy mock turtleneck sweater look seductive. She’s a fashionista for sure!
Channeling my inner and tip toeing my way into 2017 like... thanks to @azuliktulum for making my New Year one to remember! 
A photo posted by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Jan 3, 2017 at 5:23pm PST 
The star knows the color palette that best compliments her gorgeous skin and brings out the warmth of the gold undertones in her complexion. Redder earth and jewel tones and neutrals with a hint of heat fill the boho goddess’s wardrobe .
The lovely Pretty Little Liars star shared the pic from her stay at Azulik Tulum, an eco-resort with “adult styled treehouse villas.” Okay, we’re packing our bags. Here are some cute ‘fits inspired by Shay’s look.
Free People Sundown Skirt Set , $128.00 Free People This easy-to-wear set is the perfect thing to throw on during vacation, and you can wear the two pieces separately to dress up or down!
Roxy Floral Crop & Split Front Maxi Co-ord Set , $50 Boohoo The print and pattern of this set are SO Shay.
ASOS Bright Bamboo Palm Print Wrap Beach Crop Top Co-ord , $12.50 ASOS Wanna blend into your tropical surroundings? Even though this bamboo print is the right color, you’ll turn heads showing skin in this set.
Reformation Vista Dress , $74 Reformation It’s not a technical two piece, but the rust red color and light material of this tie-waisted cutout dress are perfect for a trip to someplace warm. (Ventilation is a good thing.)
ASOS Beach Bandeau Top with Maxi Skirt Co-ord , $18.50 ASOS This beach look is the slinkiest!
What are you adding to your cart? We have our eye on one or two things!
